message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for sale.  I'm asking $150 for it, but I'm open to hearing your offer.  Let me know what you think!

Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your openness to negotiation. Based on my research, I believe a fair price for this product would be around $100. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $100 just doesn't cover my costs.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $125? This is a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the market value and the condition of the product, I believe $110 would be a fair price for both parties.
